text: The Fable of Elvira and Farina and the Meal Ticket is a 1915 silent film directed by Richard Foster Baker. Gloria Swanson made her first credited appearance in this film as Farina. ==Cast== * Lillian Drew - Elvira * Gloria Swanson - Farina, Elvira's Daughter (as Gloria Mae Swanson) * Rapley Holmes - The Meal Ticket * Gerda Holmes ==References== ==External links== * Category:1915 films Category:American films Category:American silent short films Category:1915 comedy films Category:1915 short films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Essanay Studios films Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films
title: The Fable of Elvira and Farina and the Meal Ticket
